original_text: He will cause you to have all the same diseases that hurt the Egyptians and that made you very afraid. Those diseases will never leave you alone.
korean_text: 여호와께서 네가 두려워하던 애굽의 모든 질병을 네게로 가져다가 네 몸에 들어붙게 하실 것이며

sentences.original_text: He will cause you to have all the same diseases
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너에게 모든 같은 질병을 일으킬 것이다

sentences.original_text: and that made you very afraid
Those diseases will never leave you alone
sentences.korean_translation: 그 질병들은 결코 너를 혼자 두지 않을 것이다
